source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  ID, text
FROM  adf.output_rows WHERE Delta = 'D' AND Kartoteka = 'GODZINY'

SELECT  ID, text
FROM  adf.output_rows WHERE Delta = 'M' AND Kartoteka = 'GODZINY'

SELECT  ID, text
FROM  adf.output_rows WHERE Delta = 'I' AND Kartoteka = 'GODZINY'

properties.description: Wywołanie procedury przenoszącej dane z ERP/Optima i wypełniającej tabele faktur.
Zrzuca dane z SH Klientów do bufora SQL adf.SH_Klienci

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT  ID, text
FROM  adf.output_rows WHERE Delta = 'M' AND Kartoteka = 'KLIENT'

SELECT  ID, text
FROM  adf.output_rows WHERE Delta = 'I' AND Kartoteka = 'KLIENT'

ifTrueActivities.name: SaveErrorMessages
ifTrueActivities.description: In case of an error in processing of the dataset, the actual messages are saved in the pipeline variable "ProcessingErrors".
